title: Elon Musk discusses artificial intelligence with Sen. Schumer
description: Twitter owner and Tesla CEO Elon Musk on Wednesday said he discussed artificial intelligence in a meeting with Senate Majority Leader Chuck Schumer.

title: Theranos founder Elizabeth Holmes’s prison sentence delayed
description: The disgraced entrepreneur’s last-ditch attempt to remain out of prison is tied to a decision a federal judge made earlier this month.

title: Here’s how to preserve some of your most precious digital memories
description: Help Desk readers wrote in to ask about using tech to help the past live on. We have answers.

title: The latest tool in China’s influence campaign: Police on social media?
description: Chinese security ministry has been linked to an influence campaign aimed at casting the United States as an irresponsible cyber power, according to a new report.
